MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G3 postcode area of Glasgow. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm due to an underground cable fault and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:03pm on 19th February 2021.
